wikipedia_page.main: Douglas Keith McEwan Kevan best known as Keith Kevan  FRSE MIB (31 October 1920 – 9 July 1991) was a British zoologist and entomologist, who worked in Trinidad, East Africa and Canada. He published several books including on ethnoentomology and entomological poetry.

response: In 1918 he married Gynnyth Paine. Their children included Prof Douglas Keith McEwan Kevan FRSE.
